item.description:
Bring your lunch and join us every Wednesday for the Japanese Lunch Table! This is a casual and fun opportunity for language and cultural exchange between MIT students and affiliates and the greater MIT and Boston Japanese community. Practice your Japanese or English and make friends! Kids are welcome. We meet from 12:30-2pm.

We will have some lunch and drinks available first-come, first-serve on this first meeting of the semester only. 

 

Website:  http://web.mit.edu/misti/mit-japan/lunchtable.html
item.how_to_find_us: You can enter from the MIT Campus in the door labeled "14N". Take the stairs to the right to the 3rd floor; It's down the 14E hall immediately on the left.
item.name: MIT Japanese Lunch Table
